document.full_text: a fresh explosion rocked a damaged japanese nuclear power plant on tuesday where engineers have been pumping sea water into a reactor to prevent a catastrophic meltdown in the wake of a devastating earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: new explosion shakes stricken japanese nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: a fresh explosion rocked a damaged japanese nuclear power plant on tuesday where engineers have been pumping sea water into a reactor to prevent a catastrophic meltdown in the wake of a devastating earthquake and tsunami.
